channel.title: Can nobody help me?
channel.description:
I need help fixing:
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:448) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.run(server.java:274) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
Thank you!!
EDIT: For those of you that don't know.. After this error is printed in the CMD it won't let anyone log into the server but it won't D/C anyone either..Just won't let anyone new login even if someone logs then tries to re-login.. It gives "Error connecting to server"

item.title: Can nobody help me?
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

well basically, u put too many spaces in watever u were doing, u understand? like adding a monster? u used space rather than tab? it happened to me.
hope it works

love_rs_money

Read full topic

item.title: Can nobody help me?
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

I need help fixing:

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at client.<init>(client.java:448)
        at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177)
        at server.run(server.java:274)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Thank you!!

EDIT: For those of you that don’t know… After this error is printed in the CMD it won’t let anyone log into the server but it won’t D/C anyone either…Just won’t let anyone new login even if someone logs then tries to re-login… It gives “Error connecting to server”

Read full topic
